text: Introduction

tokens.raw: Introduction
tokens.text: Introduction

raw: Contributing is a key part of the function of warwick.guide credit so a systems to credit contributes has been created not just on the front page but for individual pages and question submissions.
text: Contributing is a key part of the function of warwick.guide credit so a systems to credit contributes has been created not just on the front page but for individual pages and question submissions.

tokens.raw: Contributing is a key part of the function of warwick.guide credit so a systems to credit contributes has been created not just on the front page but for individual pages and question submissions.
tokens.text: Contributing is a key part of the function of warwick.guide credit so a systems to credit contributes has been created not just on the front page but for individual pages and question submissions.

raw: Contributors can now add contact details so other students who are having difficulty or have found an error can contact those who have a good knowledge of the content. Declaring yourself as a contributor and adding contact details is optional however teaching others is good revision and it is useful to be able to contact the person who wrote the question.

raw: To add a contributor a new contributor needs to be addded to the `_contributors/contributors.json` file an example is shown below
text: To add a contributor a new contributor needs to be addded to the `_contributors/contributors.json` file an example is shown below

tokens.raw: To add a contributor a new contributor needs to be addded to the
tokens.text: To add a contributor a new contributor needs to be addded to the

tokens.raw: `_contributors/contributors.json`
tokens.text: _contributors/contributors.json

tokens.raw: file an example is shown below
tokens.text: file an example is shown below

text:
{
      "name":"Joseph Evans",
      "image":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/72259471?v=4",
      * "github":"LoudShadow",
      * "nick":"Joseph",
      * "discord":"sharpshot2566#2529",
      * "info" : "more info"
  }

raw: items shown with a * are optional
text: items shown with a * are optional

tokens.raw: items shown with a * are optional
tokens.text: items shown with a * are optional
